casebody.data:
IN RE: E.H.P. and K.L.P. 70A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 29, 2019 Annick I. Lenoir-Peek, Deputy Parent Defender, Wendy C. Sotolongo, Parent Defender, for Pressley, William Howard. Beverly Cook, Attorney at Law, for Culbreth, Eva Lynnette. Stephanie McKeon, Attorney Advocate /GAL, for E.H.P. Linda S. Fowler, Attorney Advocate /GAL, for K.L.P.

*429The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of March 2019 by Respondent (Father) to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of March 2019."
